review_data.title: A really nice bar
review_data.content: I like to go here with friends in the weekend. They have good drinks, good music and friendly personnel. The drinks are not too expensive for Zürich prices but very tasty and nicely presented.

review_data.title: Woo!
review_data.content: Nice people. Fascinating menu. Great cocktails. Only one advice – don't come around afterwork, you mind find yourself in a queue longer than the list of ingredients in a signature cocktail. But hey – worth it.

review_data.title: Super Bar mit tollem Personal
review_data.content: So nett wurde ich selten in Zürich bedient. Es war ein überaus freundlicher Servicemitarbeiter, der uns sehr freundlich am Eingang...More

review_data.title: Cocktail-Profis

review_data.title: Beste Bar in Zürich!
review_data.content: Tolle und sehr freundliche Bartender (mit coolen Tricks auf Lager), hochwertige Drinks in gutem Ambiente - I would highly recommend!

review_data.title: Excelente

review_data.title: Awesome Bar
review_data.content: We had a great time at this bar and really enjoyed the drinks and atmosphere! The service went above and beyond and I would definitely recommend making a stop here during your time in Zurich!

review_data.title: geschmackvole bar

review_data.title: Good bar with exotic cocktails
review_data.content: A very good bar near Helvetiaplatz, they have a long list of very... Fancy cocktails. Service is quite quick even when the place is packed. For after-work or just a drinking night with friends, don't forget to book a table since the place is very...More

review_data.title: Great Place to be
review_data.content: Cozy little bar, nice music, good drinks and friendly staff, really enjoyed last friday there, definately a bar to recommend and prices are quite ok for Zurich

review_data.title: Great bar, instaworthy drinks ;), amazing staff
review_data.content: This bar is one of the best in Zurich! The staff is super nice and knows how to mix a great drink. There’s a great variety of drinks on the menu and they all look pretty cool. Try the Unicorn tears!!!

review_data.title: Bar with amazing cocktails and atmosphere
review_data.content: One of the best bars in Zurich! It has special cocktails and amazing atmosphere!! Although it is fully packed the service is good and the stuff is doing their best to serve you..Strongly recommended for late night after 22:00!!

review_data.title: Not your usual drinks

review_data.title: Cocktail Heaven
review_data.content: One of the best Cocktail Bars in Zurich. From arty special drinks to the classics to custom made cocktails for your taste only. Every Thursday with Live Music.

review_data.title: The best!
review_data.content: Cool atmosphere, great range of drinks. Simply the best option to chill with my friends. PS: We love the new card.

review_data.title: Unglaublich gute Cocktails
review_data.content: Super Service und ein sehr angenehmes Ambiente. Die Drinks sind sehr fantasievoll gestaltet. (Zb Trockeneis)

review_data.title: 1 A

review_data.title: Sophisticated cocktails
review_data.content: Very professional bartenders, excellent mixing skills, kind service. Nice atmosphere. Cocktails are really excellent.

review_data.title: Delicious Cocktails
review_data.content: Don`t judge a book by its cover. Even though this bar doesn`t look so fancy from outside, it is one of my favourite cocktail bars in Zurich. The menu is very diverse and the coctails are original and delicious. The bar is decorated very cozy....More

review_data.title: Great ambience!
review_data.content: First time we visited and its just the perfect place to enjoy a few good drinks and socialise with friends! The bartenders are friendly & helpful in suggesting the best drinks. Recommend highly!

review_data.title: Best cocktails in town

review_data.title: Tolle Bar & gute Drinks

review_data.title: Nice staff and a great spot for drinks
review_data.content: Brick is located off Langstrasse (across the street from Kobal, Sport Bar Cafeteria). The barman advised me the place has been open since November 2015. They have sidewalk tables at the entrance, inside, I really like the interior decorations with the brick wall, seats at...More

review_data.title: Brilliante Cocktails
review_data.content: Weltklasse Cocktails und sehr zuvorkommendes Personal! Lohnt sich immer! Gemütliche Atmosphäre, Reservierung von Vorteil

review_data.title: Super Cocktails, hervorragender Service
